entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
